name: Hestia
info: A Sinner highly contaminated by DisSea. Gains 3 M-Valuee whenever an allied Sinner applies a [Burn] mark, up to 9 M-Value per second. Enters [Corruption State] when M-Value reaches 60, gaining an 8% Attack increase while consuming 5 M-Value per second. Leaves [Corruption State] when M-Value reaches 0.

guide.title: Shackles
guide.text:
Hestia is okay to use at S0.

Hestia's S1 is a signficant dmg increase, but can also cause her to sometimes suffer from success a little in RoD at times, since if she kills the small squishy mobs too fast, her fiery halo will disappear if the next mob/wave has not yet spawned.

S3 improve's Hestia single target dmg from her P1. I didn't put it down as a "key" shackle because Burn team does not lack single target burst at all to begin with the existence of Yanyan/Yao. If you're going this deep, you might as well go all the way to S4 for ultra speedy Ults.

pros: Magic Dmg waveclear with some good single target Dmg
No cooldown Core Dmg on ECB Ult
cons: Wants to be played with Burn team (Thistle, Yao)

skills.name: Sacred Flambeau
skills.description: Hestia attacks with her torch, dealing (Attack * 81%) Magic Damage each time.

skills.name: Igneous Illumination
skills.description:
Gives a fiery halo up to two enemies on the field (prioritizes enemies with the lowest HP who don't already carry a fiery halo), applying a [Burn] mark every second for 5 seconds. When the enemy dies or disappears, the halo will be transferred to another enemy and its effective time refreshes. Each enemy can carry only one fiery halo. Up to 6 fiery halos can exist on the field simultaneously. [Igneous Illumination] can charge up to twice.

[Burn]: Deals (Attack * 24%) Magic Damage per second for 5 seconds.

[Corruption State]: Energy Recovery Speed increases by 30%.

skills.name: Furnace Flame
skills.description:
Hestia stores the total damage that all [Burn] marks present on the field are supposed to deal during their effective time and removes all [Burn] marks. She then condenses it into a fireball and shoots it at the nearest enemy, dealing (stored value * 24%) Magic Damage. If the enemy carries a fiery halo, the fireball deals an (stored value * 15%) Magic Damage to them additionally.
[Corruption State]: Stores (Attack * 50%) damage per second.

upgrade.description:
Fireball sum value increases to $0%.
Corruption State stored value increases to $0%.

skills.name: Pyrophoric Breach
skills.description: When an allied Sinner applies a [Burn] mark to an enemy, the allied Sinner gains #30# Magic Penetration.

criminalRecord:
The subject was once a member of the "Black Ring Expedition". After the expedition force entered the DisSea, they unexpectedly encountered and then took in the subject. Although the subject is largely visually impaired, it's possible they possess an ability to detect abnormal Mania fluctuations and other dangers.  Thanks to this ability, outside of DisSea, the subject was once the saintess of "Stowe Village's Fire Mother Faith".

--

Currently detained by the MBCC. No significant abnormalities or harmful incidents have been observed to date. The subject remains within the control of the MBCC.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
The subject carries a long metal torch. The flame at the end of the torch burns constantly and can provide basic light and heat in any situation. Additionally, the flame can set Corruptors on fire, lessening Mania's harm to the environment to an extent.

+++* Awakening Signs
The subject appeared on the day of the full Illusory Moon, causing a large-scale blackout in DisSea. The MBCC's Chief detained her personally. Her body was severely corrupted by contamination and her mind was no different than that of a Corruptor.

+++* Corruption State
In a fully corrupted state, her arms have carbonized and she has nearly lost all her humanness and rationality, making communication impossible.
arrestRec1: After being detained during the Illusory Moon operation in DisSea, the subject has been placed in solitary confinement for observation and treatment. Since all current communication methods have proven futile, the MBCC has received the order for Chief to conduct dream dives with the subject.
arrestRec2: The subject was once known as Tia, a priestess from a town near DisSea. For unknown reasons, the subject was sent into DisSea, where she was saved and taken in by the expedition. The subject went missing around N.F. 21 after getting separated from the crew.
arrestRec3: In her early years, the subject wandered WhiteSands with several companions, surviving through hardships. Due to some incidents, most of her companions perished. In the following years, the subject and her remaining companions survived by luring wanderers for the desert bandits.
arrestRec4: Around N.F. 19, the subject went to a town named Stor in WhiteSands and became the so-called priestess there. The subject maintained a high status in Stor Town until she entered DisSea at the beginning of N.F. 21.
servingTerm1: Hestia. Female. Approximately 153cm tall in the infected state. Dressed in white clothing resembling a ceremonial gown. Her body is severely corrupted by highly concentrated contamination, but the infection rates of the torch she carries and her highly carbonized arms are surprisingly low.
servingTerm2: After completing the psychic diving, the subject will remain in confinement for observation. According to the log, the subject is repelled by dark and cold environments, where she shows fear and anxiety. Therefore, such conditions should best be avoided.
servingTerm3: Her torch does not require fuel and smolders under all circumstances. It is also unusually active even in highly contaminated environments. The principle behind is yet unknown.
servingTerm4: The subject is visually impaired but has exceptionally keen hearing. She is sensitive to all unfamiliar sounds in the detention room, which may cause her to panic and lose control. Only Chief's presence induces calm and positive emotions in her.

voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - EN: You... It's you?! You saw the firelight, didn't you? I knew you would. Hehe, I've been waiting for you... for so long.
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - JP: あ……あなたなのですか！？火の明かりが見えましたよね？あなたには見えると思ったんです……ふふ、ずっと……待ってましたよ……
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - KR: 너… 너인가?! 불빛이 보여? 네가 볼 수 있을 줄 알았어…헤헤, 정말 오랫동안 널… 기다려왔어…
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - CN: 你……是你？！看到火光了对吗？我就知道你能看到……嘿嘿，我等你……好久了……
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - TW: 你……是你？！看到火光了對嗎？我就知道你能看到……嘿嘿，我等你……好久了……
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - EN: I see it... the fire that will be lit.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - JP: 私は見ました……くすぶる火種を。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - EN: I... am alight... Excellent! They can finally come back...
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - JP: 私は……この身で照らしました……よかった。彼らはようやく……戻ってこられるんですね……
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - KR: 내가… 빛이 되어 밝히고 있어… 좋아, 그들이 드디어… 돌아올 수 있게 됐어…
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - CN: 我……被点亮了……太好了，他们终于能……回来了……
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - TW: 我……被點亮了……太好了，他們終於能……回來了……
voicelines.Level Start - EN: It's too dark... I'll start a fire here.
voicelines.Level Start - JP: 暗すぎますね……火を起こします。
voicelines.Level Start - CN: 太黑了……我要在这里生一团火。
voicelines.Level Start - TW: 太黑了……我要在這裡生一團火。
voicelines.Win Battles - JP: そんなに……怖くなかったですね……
voicelines.Lose Battles - EN: D-don't come any closer... Go away!
voicelines.Lose Battles - JP: こ……来ないで……あっちいって！
voicelines.Ultimate Skill - EN: This is the guidance of the flames!
voicelines.Greeting - EN: You're back... Did you find them? No...? Just asking; don't be nervous. At least, I'm still here...
voicelines.Greeting - JP: 戻ってきましたか……誰か見つけたんですか？いえ……ちょっと聞いただけです。そう緊張しないでください。少なくとも私は……まだここにいます……
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 돌아왔네… 다른 사람은 찾았어? 못 찾은 거야? 그냥 물어본 것뿐이니까 긴장하지 마. 그래도 내가… 아직 여기 있잖아…
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 你回来啦……找到其他人了？没有么……只是问问，别紧张。至少我……还在这里呢……
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 你回來啦……找到其他人了？沒有麼……只是問問，別緊張。至少我……還在這裡呢……
voicelines.Conversation 1 - EN: My eyes are blind to what you see, but they see what you cannot... They see the rising red moon, they see the descending illusion... If you wish to get out of here alive, you must follow my guidance. Do you hear me?
voicelines.Conversation 1 - JP: 私の目は……あなたたちが見ているものは見えません。ですが……あなたたちも私が見ているものは見えないのです……空に昇るあの赤い月、滅びゆく幻影……ここで生きていたいなら、私の導きに従ってください。いいですね……
voicelines.Conversation 1 - KR: 내 눈은… 너희가 볼 수 있는 걸 볼 수 없어, 하지만… 너희도 내가 볼 수 있는 걸 볼 수 없지… 하늘 위에 떠오른 붉은 달, 떨어져 가는 환영… 여기서 죽고 싶지 않으면 내가 시키는 대로 해, 알았지?
voicelines.Conversation 1 - CN: 我的眼睛……看不见你们看到的东西，但……你们也看不见我所见的……那轮升空的红月，那个殒落的幻影……想在这儿活命，就听从我的指引，明白了吗……
voicelines.Conversation 1 - TW: 我的眼睛……看不見你們看到的東西，但……你們也看不見我所見的……那輪升空的紅月，那個殞落的幻影……想在這活命，就聽從我的指引，明白了嗎……
voicelines.Conversation 2 - EN: The voice I heard... told me to light the torch. It said, it's the only way to bring you guys back... It didn't lie to me; not completely, at least. You came back...
voicelines.Conversation 2 - JP: 「松明を灯せ」……そんな声が聞こえたんです……そうしなければあなたたちは戻ってこないと……神は嘘をつきませんでした。少なくともあなたは戻ってきたのですから。そうでしょう……？
voicelines.Conversation 2 - KR: 어떤 목소리가… 내게 불을 밝히라고 말하고 있어… 내게… 이렇게 해야만 너희들이 돌아올 거라고… 거짓말이 아니었어, 최소한 네가 돌아왔잖아? 맞지?
voicelines.Conversation 2 - CN: 有个声音……让我点燃火炬……说……只有这样你们才会回来……祂没有骗我，至少你来了，不是吗……
voicelines.Conversation 2 - TW: 有個聲音……讓我點燃火炬……說……只有這樣你們才會回來……祂沒有騙我，至少你來了，不是嗎……
voicelines.Conversation 3 - EN: The people here... they're always saying bizarre things that make no sense to me... Can you understand them...? W-what do they want? You'll protect me, right?
voicelines.Conversation 3 - JP: ここの人たちは……いつも……変なことを言っています。あなたは理解できますか？彼らは……何がしたいんでしょう？あなたは私を守ってくれますよね？
voicelines.Conversation 3 - KR: 여기 사람들은… 항상… 알아들을 수 없는 말을 해. 넌 무슨 말인지 알겠어? 그들은… 그들은 대체 뭘 하려는 걸까? 네가 날 지켜 줄 거지? 그렇지?
voicelines.Conversation 3 - CN: 这里的人……总是在说一些……奇奇怪怪的话。你能听懂吗？他们……他们想要做什么？你会保护我的，对吗？
voicelines.Conversation 3 - TW: 這裡的人……總是在說一些……奇奇怪怪的話。你能聽懂嗎？他們……他們想要做什麼？你會保護我的，對嗎？
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - EN: No one has ever treated me this way... Why? Why did you guys take me in when you know nothing about me? And you're sharing your food with me, protecting me, even though you clearly don't believe what I've told you...
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - JP: あなたたちのように私を大切にしてくれる人は今までいませんでした……なぜですか？なぜそんなに簡単に見知らぬ人を受け入れ、無償で食べ物を分け与え、守ることができるんですか……私の言葉を信じていないくせに……
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - KR: 너희처럼 나를 대해주는 사람은 처음이야… 이유가 뭐야? 왜 나 같은 외부인을 이렇게 쉽게 거둬주고, 아무런 대가 없이 음식을 나눠주고 보호해 주는 거지… 너희는 분명… 내가 한 말을 믿지 않았잖아…
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - CN: 从来没有人像你们这样对待过我……为什么呢？为什么你们能这样轻易地收留一个陌生人，毫无代价地把食物分给我，还保护我……你们明明……并不相信我说的话……
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - TW: 從來沒有人像你們這樣對待過我……為什麼呢？為什麼你們能這樣輕易地收留一個陌生人，毫無代價地把食物分給我，還保護我……你們明明……並不相信我說的話……
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - EN: I also hate... that supreme being... But the supreme being does exist, just up ahead, in the direction you're heading. Why... Why don't you guys believe me?
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - JP: 私も……あの神は嫌いです……ですが、神は本当に存在します……この先、あなたが行こうとしている所にいます……どうしてですか……信じたくないんですか？
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - KR: 나도 싫지만… 그 신은… 그분은 정말 존재해… 바로 앞에, 너희가 가려는 곳에 있어… 왜… 내 말을 믿지 않는 거야?
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - CN: 我也讨厌……那个神明……可祂真的存在……就在前面，在你们要去的地方……为什么……你们不愿意相信呢？
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - TW: 我也討厭……那個神明……可祂真的存在……就在前面，在你們要去的地方……為什麼……你們不願意相信呢？
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - EN: Please don't go any further... That's a trap. If you do, the darkness will consume every one of you. I know you don't want to trust the words of a liar... but this time I'm really telling the truth...
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - JP: これ以上進んではいけません……罠です。闇はあなたたち一人ひとりを飲み込むんです……あなたたちが嘘つきを信じないのは知っています……ですが、今回は嘘ではないんです……
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - KR: 더 이상 가면 안 돼… 그건 함정이야, 어둠이 너희를 전부 집어삼킬 거야… 사기꾼의 말을 믿고 싶진 않겠지만… 이번은 정말, 정말 거짓말이 아니야…
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - CN: 不要再向前了……那是陷阱，黑暗会吞噬你们每一个人……我知道，你们不会相信骗子……可这一次，我没有说谎……
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - TW: 不要再向前了……那是陷阱，黑暗會吞噬你們每一個人……我知道，你們不會相信騙子……可這一次，我沒有說謊……
voicelines.Full Compliance - EN: It's all your fault... Because of you, I forgot how to survive on my own... Being left alone in a place like that was terrifying... Stay with me. Don't leave me again. I don't want to be left alone anymore...
voicelines.Full Compliance - JP: 全部あなたのせいですよ……私は一人で生きていく術さえ忘れてしまいました……あんな所に一人取り残されるのは……本当に……怖い……もう戻りたくない……二度と私を置いていかないでください。もう一人にはなりたくありません……
voicelines.Full Compliance - KR: 다 네 탓이야… 그동안 내가 어떻게 혼자 살아남았는지도 잊어버렸어… 그런 곳에 혼자 남겨진다니… 정말… 너무 무서워… 돌아가지 마… 다신 날 떠나지 마, 다시는 버림받고 싶지 않아…
voicelines.Full Compliance - CN: 都怪你……我连怎么独自生存下去都忘记了……一个人被留在那种地方……真的……好可怕……不要回去了……不要再离开我，我不想再被丢下了……
voicelines.Full Compliance - TW: 都怪你……我連怎麼獨自生存下去都忘記了……一個人被留在那種地方……真的……好可怕……不要回去了……不要再離開我，我不想再被丟下了……
voicelines.Idle - EN: Shh! Don't make a sound! The supreme being is watching us... I can sense it.
voicelines.Idle - JP: しーっ……静かに……神は私たちを見ています……感じたんです。
voicelines.Idle - KR: 쉿… 소리 내지 마… 그분이 우리를 보고 있어… 난 느낄 수 있어.
voicelines.Idle - CN: 嘘……不要出声……祂在看我们……我感觉到了。
voicelines.Idle - TW: 噓……不要出聲……祂在看我們……我感覺到了。
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Once again, you ventured into the darkness and found me. I knew you would; it was predestined. I knew that no matter how long it took, you would find your way back to me...
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: またしても、あなたは暗闇を越えて私を見つけましたね。分かっていましたよ。これもまた神の定めなのですから……どんなに時が経っても、あなたは私のもとに戻ってくるのです……
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 또다시, 넌 어둠을 뚫고 날 찾아냈어. 이것도 신의 계획이겠지… 얼마나 긴 시간이 지나도 넌 결국 내 곁으로 돌아올 거야…
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 又一次，你穿越黑暗找到了我。我知道的，因为这是神明的安排……无论过去多久，你都会回到我身边……
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 又一次，你穿越黑暗找到了我。我知道的，因為這是神明的安排……無論過去多久，你都會回到我身邊……
voicelines.Dispatch - EN: This is the supreme being's will too...
voicelines.Dispatch - JP: これもまた、神の御意志です……
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - JP: 私は迷子になったりしません。
voicelines.Level Up - JP: 炎が……更に明るくなりました……
voicelines.Pat Head - EN: Stop...! You must not... defile the priestess!
voicelines.Pat Head - JP: やめなさい……聖女を……冒涜することは許されませんよ！
voicelines.Pat Head - KR: 어딜 감히… 성녀를… 모독해선 안 돼!
voicelines.Pat Head - CN: 不许这样……圣女……不容亵渎！
voicelines.Pat Head - TW: 不許這樣……聖女……不容褻瀆！
